text: Tya (vrd'dha pitya) ne mhatale ki mi apalya ya dona mulimpaiki ekila tumacya vivaha (bandhana) madhye de'u icchito ya (mahara- stridhana) vara ki tumhi atha varsam paryanta majhe kamakaja karave, matra jara tumhi daha varsam paryanta karala tara he tumacyatarphe upakara mhanuna ahe. Mi kadhihi ase icchita nahi ki tumacyavara kasahi prakaraci kasta- yatana takavi. Allahane icchile tara bhavisyata tumhi mala eka bhala manusa pahala
